title: Number of choking-deaths in the U.S. 1945 to 2018
summary: Overall Number of deaths has increased over the Year.

Number of deaths is rapidly increasing from 1990 to 2000, roughly constant from 2000 to 2002, roughly increasing from 2002 to 2003, roughly constant from 2003 to 2009, and lastly slightly increasing from 2009 to 2011.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 1995 and 2000.
The highest Number of deaths, of value 4708.0 was reached at Year 2011
The lowest Number of deaths, of value 3185.0 was reported at Year 1995
